data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hNyvYNszc-4Q7kNvgHzaYr3&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYACnS1FsgPghPk5MjKamFc13LE79ggSAAymcrfRYgtGpw&oe=670D011C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=X8ZXpGlQ3w8Q7kNvgHxi2is&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBu0j7DNTJ3Zok3uIEQ8CtXzoxzA97FLzNfNZKlJRItIg&oe=670D0AA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=o3ljfOO9WvgQ7kNvgHAmPyk&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCnkLTbXZW2Lse6eX1HtId7QM_JeyetmkQuv1Sj5T39kw&oe=670CF207)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=a6sWMPq0l44Q7kNvgEZR5Cb&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCf68V7Bm9iXXCax4GpxmyiUpmwK1B_JezLUGrgkhGMCw&oe=670CE4E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=U1AG10VTRG4Q7kNvgGRxIdb&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDMiotOahQPm3rxeFszM579vmaf6ZZAPLGyPI-KF-uLCw&oe=670D1158)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=OLBIfXd-sjgQ7kNvgGs4Tf0&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAI_a3GdL_JkH-MishXsrYCNoLbIVC82whlGP6KXevi0Q&oe=670D0DD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=P4RWMrpUaOUQ7kNvgFf11IH&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDgHCDA5LQJIwrqxLPq7C6yTp5ddIxEqTHiL3Vz9VEyJw&oe=670CF3F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fFwyk94wOycQ7kNvgHvq6pv&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC_66WTfpH5_KcCzlFzSnjFSLFyUvmjeCpIduVRWuLs6g&oe=670D16AA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Elzgg8eOTdQQ7kNvgGRN6jm&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDB_-9EJ7LPjubPw2nugYGmTo_0o5R31ZpRMmA1p8Xwww&oe=670CF217)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JQqAE7kqrRIQ7kNvgHTpE27&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBNVriSN_2xy66xKVMrsWEFDyBIEhE8ltClIVP1zivXsg&oe=670D0D8C)
